text: thumb|Location of Irkutsk Oblast in Russia thumb|Location of Perm Krai in Russia Usolsky District is the name of several administrative and municipal districts in Russia: *Usolsky District, Irkutsk Oblast, an administrative and municipal district of Irkutsk Oblast *Usolsky District, Perm Krai, an administrative and municipal district of Perm Krai ==References==
title: Usolsky District
